column3: Does this cleanup orphan blocks stored in our block-files when re-importing them as new block-files?\n

@Diapolo Normally, block files do not contain orphan blocks (by which i mean blocks that have no known parent), they do have chains of stale chains that got reorganised away (which is what I assume you're talking about). This only prevents real orphan blocks from being imported.\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/5c88e3c108f8bbe0edbcd88b3f48e3eaf611cd7c for binaries and test log.\n
